title: [CRITICAL] AI Brain - Autonomous Decision Engine
body:
## Vision Gap

K.I.T. should be a **supernatural financial agent** that autonomously grows wealth.

## Current State
- Gateway exists but no autonomous decision loop
- No goal understanding
- No adaptive strategy selection

## Required Implementation

### 1. Goal Parser
User says "Grow my money safely" -> K.I.T. understands:
- Target: Growth
- Risk: Low
- Approach: Conservative strategies

### 2. Decision Engine
- Market analysis -> Signal generation -> Risk check -> Execution
- Adaptive strategy based on market conditions
- Learning from past trades

### 3. Autonomous Loop
- Continuous market monitoring
- Opportunity detection
- Autonomous trade execution with configurable limits

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User can set goals in natural language
- [ ] K.I.T. autonomously identifies opportunities
- [ ] Trades execute within risk parameters
- [ ] Performance tracked and strategies adapted

## Priority: CRITICAL
